about_the_game:
Karena opened the letter and picked up a cup of coffee)

... I was born in April E102, in the Ewutanxi tribe of the Eqha grassland ...
... I saw you in the temple when I was 14 years old when I was first cursed, but you are not the ancient person from 700 years ago...
...When I woke up again, it was already the winter of E825...
... Assuming that our meeting in the temple did not happen, then the future must not be the current future...

"Extraordinary: Immortal" is the sequel to "Extraordinary: Soul", a point-and-click puzzle game created by TeatimeWorkshop

Game features:
The operation and gameplay of the game are simple. Even if you have never played point-and-click puzzle games, you can easily get started.
The story in the game is accompanied by colorful picture book style, which will make you unable to put it down.
Follow Karena and Moe to experience a case investigation that spans time and space
detailed_description:
Special settings

For a more immersive gaming experience, we have turned off the clue prompt function in the game by default.

If you need to skip some games or check out clues:
Settings->Show Clues Button

In the third act of "Time Nexus", the piano playing game can be controlled using the keyboard: WASD


About the Game

Karena opened the letter and picked up a cup of coffee)

... I was born in April E102, in the Ewutanxi tribe of the Eqha grassland ...
... I saw you in the temple when I was 14 years old when I was first cursed, but you are not the ancient person from 700 years ago...
...When I woke up again, it was already the winter of E825...
... Assuming that our meeting in the temple did not happen, then the future must not be the current future...

"Extraordinary: Immortal" is the sequel to "Extraordinary: Soul", a point-and-click puzzle game created by TeatimeWorkshop

Game features:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB GPU Minimum - GeForce 775M | Radeon HD 6970 | Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Extraordinary: Immortal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: "Extraordinary: Immortal" tells a story of a 700-year time loop. Karena suddenly receives a mysterious letter, in which the sender informs her that there is one thing she must complete on her own, or else all the efforts to save the world from three years ago will become entirely meaningless...
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
